properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS SRC_SYS_CD
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEMID) as MFG_ORDR_MATL_LIST_ITM_ID
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.MfgOrderId) as MFG_ORDR_ID
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ProductId) as PROD_ID
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.AllowOverConsumption as BOOLEAN ) as ALLW_OVR_CNSMPTN_IND
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.AllowSubstitution as BOOLEAN ) as ALLW_SUBST_IND
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.AllowUnderConsumption as BOOLEAN ) as ALLW_UND_CNSMPTN_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BTCH_ID
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as BULK_ITM_IND
, INT(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ChangeCount) as CHG_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as CO_PROD_IND
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.DefaultLot) as DFLT_LOT_NUM
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.DefaultStockPoint) as DFLT_STK_PT_TXT
, Case when MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveFromDate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveFromDate,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS EFF_FROM_DTTM
, Case when MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveFromDateGMT = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveFromDateGMT,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS EFF_FROM_GMT_DTTM
, Case when MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveThruDate = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveThruDate,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS EFF_THRU_DTTM
, Case when MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveThruDateGMT = '0000000000' then CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) else to_timestamp(left(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.EffectiveThruDateGMT,8),\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS EFF_THRU_GMT_DTTM
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as ERP_IS_PHANTOM_IND
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ERPLineItem) as ERP_LINE_ITEM_ID
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ERPReportingFlag as BOOLEAN ) as ERP_RPTG_IND
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ExportImportKey) as EXPT_IMPT_KEY_VAL
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.IsEnabled as BOOLEAN ) as IS_ENABL_IND
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.IsFrozen as BOOLEAN ) as IS_FRZN_IND
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.IsPhantom as BOOLEAN ) as IS_PHANTOM_IND
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.IssueControl) as ISS_CNTL_CD
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ITM_CAT_CD
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.MfgOrderMaterialListItemName) as MFG_ORDR_MATL_LIST_ITM_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OBJ_TYPE_ID
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.gdnOriginalQtyRequired AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as ORIG_REQ_QTY
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.PhantomBillId) as PHANTOM_BILL_ID
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ProductBaseId) as PROD_BASE_ID
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.isProductDescription) as PROD_DESC
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ReferenceDesignator) as REF_DSGNR_CD
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.QtyRequired AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as REQ_QTY
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.Qty2Required AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as REQ_2_QTY
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RESV_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RESV_ITM_NUM
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.RouteStepId) as RTE_STEP_ID
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.ScrapPercent AS DECIMAL(9,4)) as SCRAP_PCT
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.SetupQty AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as SETUP_QTY
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.SetupQty2 AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as SETUP_2_QTY
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.SubFactory as BOOLEAN ) as SUB_FCTRY_IND
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.UOMId) as UOM_ID
, TRIM(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.UOM2Id) as UOM_2_ID
, CAST(MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM.VendorControl as BOOLEAN ) as VEND_CNTL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as WHSE_IND
FROM  {Config.sourceDatabase}.MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM as MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM WHERE MFGORDERMATERIALLISTITEM._deleted_ =  'F'  
 
""")
